Package edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Event
    This class represents an event of a vacation, which are contained inside an array list of events for each vacation as one of the fields.
    EventListAdapter
    This class is used to adapt our Array List of events to our list view in the Vacations Main Activity class to provide an accurate and updated version of our event list every time.
    FileSaver
    This class is used to store our data to external storage.
    LeisureEvent
    This class represents a Leisure Event of a vacation, which is one of the two subclasses of Event, and contains five fields, three of which are inherited from the Event class (name, date, and time).
    LeisureEventActivity
    This activity is used to create a new leisure event inside a vacation.
    MainActivity
    This is our Main Activity, where the user can view all their vacations, and click on them to view that specific vacation's main activity
    SplashActivity
    This activity represents the Splash Screen for our Vacation Planner App.
    StartActivity
    This activity is the first thing that shows up when the app is started after the splash screen.
    TransportationEvent
    This class represents a Transportation Event of a vacation, which is one of the two subclasses of Event, and contains six fields, three of which are inherited from the Event class (name, date, and time).
    TransportationEventActivity
    This activity is very similar to the LeisureEventActivity class, but this is to create or modify a transportation activity, which is an activity that does require some type of commute from place to place
    Vacation
    This class represents a vacation, which has 5 different fields/attributes: a name, location, start date, end date, and an array list of events.
    VacationActivity
    This activity is used for users to create a new vacation and add it to their current list of vacations.
    VacationListAdapter
    This class is used to adapt our Array List of vacations to our list view in the Main Activity class to provide an accurate and updated version of our vacation list every time.
    VacationsMainActivity
    This Activity is the activity that contains a majority of the app's features, as this is the home page for a specific vacation.
